## Sign-up to Present

If you haven't already done so:

* Sign up in URCourses: Projects > Sign up to Present
* **You will get extra engagement credit if you present on the first day (today)!**
* If you are presenting today, place your link in Projects > Presentation Links > Math + Language, Day 1 

## Presentation Guidelines

Share:

* Title + intentions for your project 
* Inspirations and resources that helped you
* A detailed overview of 5-15 lines of code
* What you are most proud of
* What you would do if you had more time


# Study for Quiz #6 on Thursday!

## Notes on Quiz #7

* Quiz #7 takes place on October 16
* It will test your knowledge of one section of your Math + Language code project
* You will receive a print out of your code, with comments removed, along with questions about a subsection of your code
